testcase.name: Cancel_Checkout
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Cancel checkout given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 8.012s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.1755s when User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.244s when User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.374s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.24s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.24s e when User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.24s when User clicks Cancel on overview ... passed in 1.215s then User navigates to the cart page ... passed in 0.0469s then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.007978s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Error_On_Empty_Checkout_Fields
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Error on empty checkout fields given User login as 'problem' user ... passed in 8.396s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.2194s when User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.248s when User adds item 'Onesie' to the cart ... passed in 1.199s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.235s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.242s e when User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Problem', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.29s then User continue from checkout overview ... passed in 1.215s then Error: Last Name is required should be displayed ... passed in 0.01492s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
